com.mellanox.jxio

Class EventQueueHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mellanox.jxio.EventQueueHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class EventQueueHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class recieves events from accelio. It implements Runnable. Each EventQueueHandle should be run a different thread.

      static interface  EventQueueHandler.Callbacks
      This interface needs to be implemented and passed to EventQueueHandler in c-tor
      static class  EventQueueHandler.DataFromC

      • run

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the running thread which is blocked on the run() interface

      • runEventLoop

        public int runEventLoop(int maxEvents,
               long timeOutMicroSec)
        Main progress engine thread entry point. This function will cause all depending objects callbacks to be activated respectfully on new event occur. the calling thread will block for 'maxEvents' or a total duration of 'timeOutMicroSec.
        Parameters:
        maxEvents - : function will block until processing max events (callbacks) before returning or the timeout reached use '-1' for infinite number of events
        timeOutMicroSec - : function will block until max duration of timeOut (measured in micro-sec) or maxEvents reached use '-1' for infinite duration
        Returns:
        number of events processes or zero if timeout

      • breakEventLoop

        public void breakEventLoop()
        Main progress engine thread break point. Calling this function will force the runEventLoop() function to return when possible, no matter the number of events or duration it still should be blocking. This function can be called from any thread context

      • close

        public void close()
        Close (and stops) this EQH and release all corresponding Java and Native resources (including closing the related ServerSessions, ServerPortal and ClientSession) This function Should be called only once no other thread is inside the runEventLoop()

      • bindMsgPool

        public boolean bindMsgPool(MsgPool msgPool)
        This method binds MsgPool to this EQH. It is necessary for MsgPool on server side to be binded to server's EQH
        Parameters:
        msgPool - to be binded to this EQH
        Returns:
        bool that indicate if the bind was successful

      • releaseMsgPool

        public void releaseMsgPool(MsgPool msgPool)
        This method releases MsgPool from server's EQH (opposite of bindMsgPool)
        Parameters:
        msgPool - to be released

      • getAdditionalMsgPool

        public void getAdditionalMsgPool(int inSize,
                        int outSize)
